view.intro-text: You have indicated that you have access to the following governmental benefits.
view.update-your-access-text: Update your access to governmental benefits.
view.no-government-benefits: You have indicated you do not have access to any government benefits

info-updated.alert-heading: You have successfully applied for the Canadian Dental Care Plan!

index.intro-text: If you have access to governmental benefits, keep that information up to your date on your application.
index.body-text: This information will be used to help coordinate payment with Sun Life
index.update-your-access-text: Update your access to governmental benefits.

edit.page-title: Access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
edit.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
edit.eligibility-criteria: If you meet all the eligibility criteria, your coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.
edit.required-label: Complete all fields unless marked as optional

federal-benefits.title: Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: Do you have dental benefits through a social program offered by a federal program?

social-programs.legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: Do you have dental benefits through a social program offered by your province or territory?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have provincial or territorial benefits

social-programs.input-legend: If yes, through which province or territory?
social-programs.radio-legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-required: Select whether you have federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: Select whether you have provincial or territorial dental benefits
